title: Kinetic energy of a projectile to escape planet

content.prompt: Let g be the acceleration due to gravity at the surface of a planet of radius R. Which of the following is a dimensionally correct formula for the minimum kinetic energy K that a projectile of mass m must have at the planet’s surface if the projectile is to escape from the planet’s gravitational field?

choices.label: K =  gR MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3811@

K =  m g R MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3951@

unit.text: 6: Energy and Momentum of Rotating Systems
